pages.title: DenLiner Gouka
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Den-O (2007, TV show)$(br2)Spawns throughout the Sands of Time$(br2)Chance to find $(l:den_o/mobs/momotaros)Momotaros$(/l) inside$(br)Chance to spawn with $(l:den_o/structures/denliner_gouka#sieg_carriage)an extra carriage...$(/l)$(br2)Chest loot:$(li)1 $(l:den_o/items/rider_tickets#rider_ticket_sword)Rider Ticket Momotaros$(/l)$(li)4-6 $(l:den_o/items/imagin_sand)Imagin Sand$(/l) (16%)$(li)3-7 $(l:den_o/items/rider_tickets#rider_ticket)Rider Tickets$(/l) (53%)$(li)1 $(l:den_o/items/rider_tickets#rider_ticket_sword)Rider Ticket Momotaros$(/l) (31%)

pages.title: Sieg's Carriage
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Den-O (2007, TV show)$(br2)Rare chance to spawn as part of the DenLiner Gouka$(br2)Chest loot:$(li)1 $(l:den_o/items/rider_tickets#rider_ticket_wing)Rider Ticket Sieg$(/l)$(li)4-6 $(l:den_o/items/imagin_sand)Imagin Sand$(/l) (16%)$(li)3-7 $(l:den_o/items/rider_tickets#rider_ticket)Rider Tickets$(/l) (53%)$(li)1 $(l:den_o/items/rider_tickets#rider_ticket_wing)Rider Ticket Sieg$(/l) (31%)
